headline.print_headline: Let Me Chew My Coca Leaves
headline.main: Let Me Chew My Coca Leaves

docs.lead_paragraph: To place coca leaves in the same category with cocaine, as a United Nations convention on narcotic drugs did 48 years ago, is to disregard simple biochemistry.
docs.snippet: To place coca leaves in the same category with cocaine, as a United Nations convention on narcotic drugs did 48 years ago, is to disregard simple biochemistry.

headline.print_headline: Exercise: Fitness Ads May Raise the Appetite
headline.main: Exercise: Fitness Ads May Raise the Appetite

docs.lead_paragraph: New research suggests that campaigns to promote exercise may have an unintended consequence: they make people eat more.
docs.snippet: New research suggests that campaigns to promote exercise may have an unintended consequence: they make people eat more.
